title: Inter-facility characterization of bacteria in seafood processing plants: Exploring potential reservoirs of spoilage organisms and the resistome
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Karla Fabiola Corral-Jara, Sigurlaug Skírnisdóttir, Stephen Knobloch, Helgi Briem, José F. Cobo-Díaz, Niccolò Carlino, Pauline Bergsten, Federica Armanini, Francesco Asnicar, Federica Pinto, Avelino Alvarez-Ordóñez, Nicola Segata, Viggó þór Marteinsson
